name: TriviaTime
0:
”Alexa, open trivia time”
”Alexa, ask trivia time to start a game”
”Alexa, tell trivia time the answer is B.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trivia time
des: "Alexa, ask trivia time for a new game" and receive a multiple choice questions to answer. For best results, phrase your answer in the form of, "The answer is [letter]."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
